name: Mingle with friendly monkeys, watch beautiful sunset and check out one of the world wonders - the fireflies!
description: This half-day trip will take you to 4 interesting places in Kuala Selangor - where you will have the chance to mingle with friendly monkeys ;-), watch beautiful sunset on top of a hill that has significant history and get on a boat to see our own tinsel town of fireflies! This trip will end with a scrumptious seafood dinner by the beach - ALL without burning a hole in your pocket.. As we say it in Malay...JOM! (let's go!)
